casebody.data:
STATE
v.
David Franklin HURT. No. 192A04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 2, 2004. Robert C. Montgomery, Assistant Attorney General, James C. Gaither, Jr., District Attorney, for State. Barbara Blackman, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Hurt.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 29th day of July 2004 by Attorney General for Extension of Time to File State's Response to Motion for Appropriate Relief:

"Motion Allowed. Attorney General shall have up to and including the 13th day of August 2004 to file Response with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 2nd day of August 2004."
